name: WebSocket
description: Lightweight WebSocket wrapper used by the gateway client to send and receive raw frames, handle compression, and manage connection lifecycle.

important_methods.name: connect(url:)
important_methods.description: Open a WebSocket connection to the provided URL.

important_methods.name: send(data:)
important_methods.description: Send a binary or text frame over the socket.

important_methods.name: receive() -> Data
important_methods.description: Suspend until a frame is received; returns raw data.

important_methods.name: close(code:reason:)
important_methods.description: Close the connection with code and reason.

notes: This is a low-level primitive; prefer `GatewayClient` for handling identify/heartbeat/resume logic. Handles zlib compression when configured by Discord.
